text: @RahulGandhi Don't talk about arrogance when ur ignorance is seen in #Maharashtra. @Swamy39 was right you are a budhu. People would die of starvation rather than covid-19 if the lock down continues. And it is the call of state govt now. Why don't you put ur diplomacy in #Maharashtra
